meanings.definition: A person who specializes in cryptanalysis.
meanings.sent1: The cryptanalysts worked together to decode the secret message.
meanings.sent2: The government hired cryptanalysts to break the enemy's secret code.
meanings.sent3: The cryptanalysts joked that cracking codes was like solving puzzles all day.
meanings.sent4: The cryptanalysts' minds were like master keys, unlocking hidden meanings.
meanings.sent5: In the world of spies, cryptanalysts are the unsung heroes who reveal the truth behind the codes.

meanings.definition: The cryptanalysts were able to decipher the coded message.
meanings.sent1: After hours of work, the cryptanalysts finally cracked the code.
meanings.sent2: The cryptanalysts' expertise in decryption was unmatched.
meanings.sent3: The cryptanalysts playfully challenged each other to code-breaking competitions.
meanings.sent4: The cryptanalysts' success in unraveling mysteries was like magic to others.
meanings.sent5: Cryptanalysts possess a unique skill set that unveils hidden secrets in plain sight.
